channel.title: smallgrants on USABLE Tools
channel.description: Recent content in smallgrants on USABLE Tools

item.title: USABLE at the Internet Freedom Festival
item.description: The USABLE team is excited to be gearing up for the Internet Freedom Festival this year to contiue sharing lessons learned by developers looking to listen and engage with their users.

item.title: Announcing the UXFund Results!
item.description: The USABLE team is proud to announce the UXFund results for the small, but targeted usability enhancement grants. Many great proposals were received and, after a thorough review process, five organizations for short-term awards were selected.
